SQL.value: update HZFP_SQD set FLBMBBBH=@FLBMBBBH, FPDM=@FPDM, FPHM=@FPHM, KPJH=@KPJH, GFMC=@GFMC, GFSH=@GFSH, XFMC=@XFMC, XFSH=@XFSH, TKRQ=@TKRQ, SSYF=@SSYF, HJJE=@HJJE, SL=@SL, HJSE=@HJSE, JBR=@JBR, SQXZ=@SQXZ, SQLY=@SQLY, SQRDH=@SQRDH, YYSBZ=@YYSBZ, XXBBH=@XXBBH, XXBZT=@XXBZT, XXBMS=@XXBMS where SQDH=@SQDH
update HZFP_SQD set XXBBH=@XXBBH, XXBZT=@XXBZT, XXBMS=@XXBMS where SQDH=@SQDH

var.name: condition
var.value: CASE WHEN @MONbz=0 THEN 1=1 ELSE strftime('%m',TKRQ) = strftime('%m',@MON) END

SQL.value: SELECT COUNT(SQDH) FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition#; SELECT FPZL,SQDH,FPDM, case length(FPHM) when 1 then case lower(FPHM) when '0' then '' else '0000000'||FPHM end when 2 then '000000'||FPHM when 3 then '00000'||FPHM when 4 then '0000'||FPHM when 5 then '000'||FPHM when 6 then '00'||FPHM when 7 then '0'||FPHM else lower(FPHM) end FPHM, KPJH,GFMC,GFSH,XFMC,XFSH,TKRQ,SSYF,HJJE, case lower(ifnull(SL,'9')) when '9' then '多税率' when '0.0' then '免税' else lower(SL) end SL, HJSE,JBR,SQXZ,SQLY,SQRDH,BBBZ,REQNSRSBH,JSPH,XXBBH,XXBZT,XXBMS,FLBMBBBH FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition# ORDER BY TKRQ desc Limit @endNO-@beginNO+1 Offset @beginNO-1

var.name: condition
var.value: CASE WHEN @MONbz=0 THEN 1=1 ELSE strftime('%m',TKRQ) = strftime('%m',@MON) END and ((XXBZT == 'TZD0000') or (XXBZT == 'TZD1000'))and [XFSH] like @xfsh

SQL.value: SELECT COUNT(SQDH) FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition#; SELECT FPZL,SQDH,FPDM, case length(FPHM) when 1 then case lower(FPHM) when '0' then '' else '0000000'||FPHM end when 2 then '000000'||FPHM when 3 then '00000'||FPHM when 4 then '0000'||FPHM when 5 then '000'||FPHM when 6 then '00'||FPHM when 7 then '0'||FPHM else lower(FPHM) end FPHM, KPJH,GFMC,GFSH,XFMC,XFSH,TKRQ,SSYF,HJJE, case lower(ifnull(SL,'9')) when '9' then '多税率' when '0.0' then '免税' else lower(SL) end SL, HJSE,JBR, CASE length(SQXZ) WHEN 11 THEN substr(SQXZ,1,10) END SQXZ, BBBZ,REQNSRSBH,JSPH,XXBBH,XXBZT,XXBMS,FLBMBBBH FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition# ORDER BY TKRQ desc Limit @endNO-@beginNO+1 Offset @beginNO-1

var.name: condition
var.value: [SQDH] like @sqdh and [TKRQ] > strftime('%Y-%m-%d',@ksrq) and [TKRQ] < strftime('%Y-%m-%d',@jsrq) and [GFMC] like @gfmc and [GFSH] like @gfsh and [XFMC] like @xfmc and [XFSH] like @xfsh and [BBBZ] like @bbbz and (([REQNSRSBH] like @reqnsrsbh)or([REQNSRSBH] like @oldreqnsrsbh)) and (CASE WHEN (@xxbzt = 'all') THEN 1=1 WHEN (@xxbzt = 'TZD0500') THEN XXBZT = 'TZD0500' WHEN (@xxbzt = 'TZD0000') THEN ((XXBZT = 'TZD0000') or (XXBZT ='TZD0061')) WHEN (@xxbzt = 'TZD1500') THEN XXBZT = 'TZD1500' WHEN (@xxbzt = 'TZD1000') THEN XXBZT = 'TZD1000' WHEN (@xxbzt = 'TZD1002') THEN XXBZT = 'TZD1002' WHEN (@xxbzt = 'fail') THEN (XXBZT !='TZD0500' and XXBZT !='TZD0000' and XXBZT !='TZD0061' and XXBZT !='TZD1500' and XXBZT !='TZD1000') WHEN (@xxbzt = 'yhx') THEN ((XXBZT = 'TZD0072') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0073') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0074') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0075') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0076') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0077') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1072') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1073') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1074') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1075') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1076') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1077')) WHEN (@xxbzt = 'other') THEN ((XXBZT = 'TZD0071') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0078') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0079') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0080') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0081') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0082') or (XXBZT = 'TZD0083') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1071') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1078') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1079') or (XXBZT = 'TZD1080')) ELSE 1=1 END) and ([SQDH] like @qquick or [GFMC] like @qquick or [GFSH] like @qquick or [XFMC] like @qquick or [XFSH] like @qquick)

SQL.value: SELECT COUNT(SQDH) FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition#; SELECT SQDH,FPZL,FPDM, case length(FPHM) when 1 then case lower(FPHM) when '0' then '' else '0000000'||FPHM end when 2 then '000000'||FPHM when 3 then '00000'||FPHM when 4 then '0000'||FPHM when 5 then '000'||FPHM when 6 then '00'||FPHM when 7 then '0'||FPHM else lower(FPHM) end FPHM, KPJH,GFMC,GFSH,XFMC,XFSH,TKRQ,SSYF,HJJE, case lower(ifnull(SL,'9')) when '9' then '多税率' when '0.0' then '免税' else lower(SL) end SL, HJSE,JBR, CASE length(SQXZ) WHEN 11 THEN substr(SQXZ,1,10) END SQXZ, BBBZ,REQNSRSBH,JSPH,XXBBH,XXBZT,XXBMS,FLBMBBBH FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition# ORDER BY TKRQ desc Limit @endNO-@beginNO+1 Offset @beginNO-1

var.name: condition
var.value: (([XFSH] like @xfsh)or([XFSH] like @oldxfsh)) and (([XXBZT] like @xxbzt) or ([XXBZT] like @xxbzt_yq))

SQL.value: SELECT COUNT(SQDH) FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition#; SELECT SQDH,FPZL,FPDM, case length(FPHM) when 1 then case lower(FPHM) when '0' then '' else '0000000'||FPHM end when 2 then '000000'||FPHM when 3 then '00000'||FPHM when 4 then '0000'||FPHM when 5 then '000'||FPHM when 6 then '00'||FPHM when 7 then '0'||FPHM else lower(FPHM) end FPHM, KPJH,GFMC,GFSH,XFMC,XFSH,TKRQ,SSYF,HJJE, case lower(ifnull(SL,'9')) when '9' then '多税率' when '0.0' then '免税' else lower(SL) end SL, HJSE,JBR, CASE length(SQXZ) WHEN 11 THEN substr(SQXZ,1,10) END SQXZ, BBBZ,REQNSRSBH,JSPH,XXBBH,XXBZT,XXBMS,FLBMBBBH FROM HZFP_SQD WHERE #condition# ORDER BY TKRQ desc Limit @endNO-@beginNO+1 Offset @beginNO-1

update HZFP_SQD_MX set JE=@JE, SLV=@SLV, SE=@SE, SPMC=@SPMC, SPSM=@SPSM, GGXH=@GGXH, JLDW=@JLDW, SL=@SL, DJ=@DJ, HSJBZ=@HSJBZ, FPHXZ=@FPHXZ, SPBH=@SPBH, XTHASH=@XTHASH, FLBM=@FLBM, QYSPBM=@QYSPBM, SFXSYHZC=@SFXSYHZC, YHZCMC=@YHZCMC, LSLBS=@LSLBS where SQDH=@SQDH and MXXH=@MXXH
select SQDH,MXXH,JE,SLV,SE,SPMC,SPSM,GGXH,JLDW,SL,DJ,HSJBZ,FPHXZ,SPBH,XTHASH,FLBM,QYSPBM,SFXSYHZC,YHZCMC,LSLBS from HZFP_SQD_MX where SQDH=@SQDH order by MXXH ASC
select strftime('%m',TKRQ) mon from HZFP_SQD WHERE strftime('%Y',TKRQ)=@YEAR group BY strftime('%m',TKRQ)
SELECT ZZSTSGL FROM BM_SPFL WHERE BM = @BM Text
SELECT SLV FROM BM_SPFL WHERE HBBM = @HBBM Text
SELECT SLV FROM BM_YHZC WHERE YHZCMC = @YHZCMC Text
select MC from BM_SP where MC=@MC AND XTHASH <> '' AND XTHASH IS NOT NULL
